affix.apotheosis:ranged/special/spectral: You have a %s%% chance to shoot a second arrow.
affix.apotheosis:sword/special/festive.d: Slain enemies have a %s%% chance to be a Loot Piñata
affix.apotheosis:sword/special/thunderst: Your attacks deal %s damage to nearby enemies.
affix.apotheosis:shield/special/retreati: You will leap back when blocking in melee.
affix.apotheosis:telepathic.desc.weapon: Mob drops will teleport to you.
affix.apotheosis:telepathic.desc.tool: Block drops will teleport to you.
affix.apotheosis:heavy_weapon/special/ex: Enemies below %s%% max health will be executed.
affix.apotheosis:heavy_weapon/special/cl: Attacks have a %s%% chance to also hit up to %s nearby enemies.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/special/enlight: This tool can place a torch at the cost of %s durability.
Blocking a projectile deals %s%% of the damage to the shooter.
affix.apotheosis:shield/special/catalyzi: Blocking an explosion will grant you great strength.
This tool breaks in a %sx%s area.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/special/omnetic: This tool has %s effectiveness against all blocks.
affix.apotheosis:durable.desc: This item ignores %s%% of durability damage.
info.apotheosis.socketing:
Gems can be socketed with a Smithing Table. Item on the left, gem on the right.

Choose wisely, as removing a socketed gem is costly.
bonus.apotheosis:bloody_arrow.desc: When firing, you lose %s%% Max Health and deal %s%% damage. %s
bonus.apotheosis:leech_block.desc: Blocking an attack heals you for %s%% of the damage. %s
gem.apotheosis:overworld/royalty.bonus.p: Breaking Copper Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Raw Gold instead.
bonus.apotheosis:mageslayer.desc: Ignore %s%% of magic damage and heal for the same amount.
bonus.apotheosis:twilight_ore_magnet.des: Can be used as an Ore Magnet, costing an extra %s durability.
bonus.apotheosis:twilight_treasure_gobli: Attacking an entity has a %s%% chance to summon a Treasure Goblin. %s
Taking damage has a %s%% chance to fortify you with Twilight Shields. %s
item.apotheosis.gem.apotheosis:the_nethe: Gem of the Ravenous Blood Lord
block.apotheosis.gem_cutting_table.desc: Uses Gem Dust and Rarity Materials to upgrade Gems
block.apotheosis.salvaging_table.desc: Breaks down Affix Items into Rarity Materials
block.apotheosis.reforging_table.desc: Uses Gem Dust and Rarity Materials to reroll affixes
info.apotheosis.gem_crushing: Gem Dust is obtained by dropping any Apothic Gem the in world, and making an Anvil block fall onto it.
info.apotheosis.gem_extraction:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Apothic Gems.

The item will be destroyed in the process.
info.apotheosis.gem_expulsion:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Apothic Gems.

The gems will be destroyed in the process.
info.apotheosis.unnaming: Used in a Smithing Table to remove the affix components from an item's name.
info.apotheosis.salvaging: Rarity Materials are obtained by salvaging Affix Items in a Salvaging Table.
advancements.apotheosis.enchantment.desc: Obtain an enchanting table, and begin to unveil the mystery.
advancements.apotheosis.sculkshelf.desc: Create a Sculkshelf using a Warden Tendril.
advancements.apotheosis.endshelf.desc: Acquire Infused Dragon's Breath, and create an Endshelf.
advancements.apotheosis.upgrade_endshelf: Upgrade an Endshelf into a Draconic Endshelf.
Obtain an Infused Seashelf through Infusion Enchanting.
advancements.apotheosis.infuse_hellshelf: Obtain an Infused Hellshelf through Infusion Enchanting.
advancements.apotheosis.altar.desc: Create an Altar of the Seas, which can turn unwanted enchanted items into a new book.
advancements.apotheosis.splitting.desc: Successfully drop an anvil enchanted with Splitting on an enchanted book to split it apart
advancements.apotheosis.sharp10.desc: Enchant a weapon with Sharpness X or higher
advancements.apotheosis.level20.desc: Obtain an item with an enchantment at level XX or higher
advancements.apotheosis.enchanting_stats: Enchant an item while having at least 10 of each stat.
advancements.apotheosis.max_stats.desc: Enchant an item while having all stats at maximum.
advancements.apotheosis.max_stable.desc: Enchant an item while having max Eterna and Arcana, but 0% Quanta.
advancements.apotheosis.max_rectified.de: Enchant an item with max stats and max rectification.
advancements.apotheosis.affix.desc: Find an item with an Apothic Affix.
advancements.apotheosis.boss.desc: Slay an Apothic Boss, and retrieve their affix item.
advancements.apotheosis.chests.desc: Find an affix item in a chest.
advancements.apotheosis.merchant.desc: Purchase an affix item from the wandering trader.
advancements.apotheosis.random.desc: Retrieve an affix item from a random monster.
advancements.apotheosis.gem.desc: Find a Apothic Gem, which can be socketed into Affix Items.
advancements.apotheosis.ancient_gem.desc: Using the Gem Cutting Table, create a Perfect Gemstone.
advancements.apotheosis.socket.desc: Using a Smithing Table, socket a Gem into an item.
advancements.apotheosis.gem_cut.desc: Use the Gem Cutting Table to upgrade an Apothic Gem.
advancements.apotheosis.spawner.root.des: Spawners can be collected and modified, see JEI for info.
advancements.apotheosis.spawner.desc: Collect a mob spawner using Silk Touch.
advancements.apotheosis.capturing.desc: Get a spawn egg from a mob using the Capturing enchantment
advancements.apotheosis.modifier.desc: Use a spawner modifier to change the stats of a spawner.
advancements.apotheosis.spawncount: Look at the Size of His Spawner!
advancements.apotheosis.spawncount.desc: Raise the spawn count of a spawner to 16
advancements.apotheosis.maxdelay.desc: Decrease the maximum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.apotheosis.mindelay.desc: Decrease the minimum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.apotheosis.nearbyents.desc: Raise the max nearby entities of a spawner to 32
advancements.apotheosis.playerrange.desc: Raise the player activation range of a spawner to 48
advancements.apotheosis.spawnrange.desc: Raise the spawn range of a spawner to 32
advancements.apotheosis.conditions.desc: Disable spawn conditions for a spawner
advancements.apotheosis.players.desc: Disable the need for nearby players for a spawner
advancements.apotheosis.redstone.desc: Enable redstone control for a spawner
advancements.apotheosis.light.desc: Make your spawner work in any light level.
advancements.apotheosis.noai.desc: Disable Mob AI for a spawner.
advancements.apotheosis.ultimate_spawner: Create a spawner with minimal delays that has redstone control, no AI, ignores spawn conditions, and ignores players.
enchantment.apotheosis.capturing.desc: Makes mobs have a chance to drop their spawn egg.
misc.apotheosis.min_value: This modifier cannot reduce this below %s
misc.apotheosis.max_value: This modifier cannot increase this above %s
misc.apotheosis.banned: Cannot be used on a Spawner
stat.apotheosis.min_delay.desc: The minimum number of ticks between spawns
stat.apotheosis.max_delay.desc: The maximum number of ticks between spawns
stat.apotheosis.spawn_count.desc: The number of entities spawned at once
stat.apotheosis.max_nearby_entities.desc: The total number of entities allowed nearby
stat.apotheosis.req_player_range.desc: How far a player can be before spawning stops
stat.apotheosis.spawn_range.desc: The radius (in blocks) that mobs can spawn in
stat.apotheosis.ignore_players.desc: The spawner does not need a nearby player
stat.apotheosis.redstone_control.desc: The spawner requires redstone to activate
stat.apotheosis.no_ai.desc: Spawned entities will have no AI
stat.apotheosis.silent.desc: Spawned entities will make no noise
stat.apotheosis.baby.desc: The spawner will always spawn a baby entity when possible
info.apotheosis.spawner: Spawners can be collected with %s and may be modified with various items.
info.apotheosis.spawner.no_silk: Spawners may be modified with various items, but collection with Silk Touch is currently disabled.
info.apotheosis.spawner.always_drop: Spawners may be modified with various items, and will always drop when broken.
info.apotheosis.capturing: The capturing enchantment gives monsters a chance to drop their spawn egg.\n \nDrop Rate: 0.4%% per level
info.apotheosis.cobweb: Can be used to remove enchantments.
info.apotheosis.enchanting: Enchanting tables can now exceed 30 levels.  Some enchantments may only show up past level 30.
info.apotheosis.altar:
The Altar of the Sea is a focus for conversion of enchanted items.

To begin, place one enchanted item on each pillar. Once all items are provided, the altar will drain experience from nearby players.
If experience cannot be drained, white particles will spawn.

Once complete, all items are consumed, and an enchanted book is generated.  Treasure enchantments can be obtained.
gui.apotheosis.enchant.arcana.desc3: and increases the number of enchantments
info.apotheosis.filtering_shelf: Insert enchanted books to prevent them from appearing in the table.
info.apotheosis.filtering_shelf2: Gains eterna and arcana based on the number of inserted books.
enchantment.apotheosis.mounted_strike.de: Deals extra damage when on a horse.
enchantment.apotheosis.miners_fervor.des: You will mine very fast, but never instantly.
enchantment.apotheosis.stable_footing.de: Negates the mining speed penalty for flying.
enchantment.apotheosis.scavenger.desc: Mobs killed may roll their loot tables twice.
enchantment.apotheosis.life_mending.desc: Consumes received healing to repair items.
death.attack.apotheosis:corrupted: %s was drained by a corrupted enchantment.
info.apotheosis.prismatic_cobweb: Can be used to remove curses.
info.apotheosis.tome_error: Bugged Item - Right click in the air to turn into an enchanted book.
info.apotheosis.scrap_tome: Extracts half of the enchantments from an item.
info.apotheosis.scrap_tome2: Destroys the item in the process.
info.apotheosis.improved_scrap_tome: Extracts all of the enchantments from an item.
info.apotheosis.improved_scrap_tome2: Destroys the item in the process.
info.apotheosis.extraction_tome: Extracts all of the enchantments from an item.
enchantment.apotheosis.reflective.desc: Blocked attacks may harm the attacker.
enchantment.apotheosis.knowledge.desc: Enemy drops are directly converted to experience.
enchantment.apotheosis.splitting.desc: Allows anvils to split multiple enchantments from books they fall upon.
enchantment.apotheosis.obliteration.desc: Allows anvils to split single enchantments from books they fall upon.
Hoes may be used to bonemeal crops.
enchantment.apotheosis.rebounding.desc: Melee attackers may find themselves much further away.
Magic damage dealt by and to the user is reduced.
enchantment.apotheosis.crescendo.desc: Your crossbow may be fired additional times per reload.
enchantment.apotheosis.chromatic.desc: Sheared wool will be changed to a random color.
enchantment.apotheosis.exploitation.desc: Wool received is doubled, but the sheep takes damage.
enchantment.apotheosis.growth_serum.desc: Sheep have a 50% chance to instantly regrow their wool.
enchantment.apotheosis.earths_boon.desc: Ores may be found when mining stone.
enchantment.apotheosis.spearfishing.desc: Kills with a thrown trident may catch a fish.
info.apotheosis.library: The enchantment library is a block that stores enchantments.  Inserting an enchanted book will deposit it.  Left-clicking on a stored enchantment will extract one level of it.  Shift-clicking will extract the max level available.
item.apotheosis.potion_charm.desc: Applies %s when active and in the inventory.
item.apotheosis.potion_charm.curios_only: Only works in a Curios slot
info.apotheosis.ender_lead: The Ender Lead is an item that can be used to move animals around.  Punch an animal to capture, and right click to release it.  The leash will not work on other types of entities.
info.apotheosis.mining_arrow.iron: Breaks blocks like an iron pickaxe
info.apotheosis.mining_arrow.diamond: Breaks blocks like a diamond pickaxe
book.apotheosis.name: Chronicle of Shadows
book.apotheosis.subtitle: Guide to Apotheosis
book.apotheosis.landing: Welcome to the world of Apotheosis.$(br2)Apotheosis is organized into $(#8080FF)Modules$(), and so is the content of this book.$(br2)Disabled modules are hidden.
